page.title: 02LOCAL CONCERNS
page.content:
Although many people in this area have lived here for a long time there are a number who have moved out from the big cities such as London to enjoy the peace of the countryside.Unfortunately as more people begin to do this more houses are being built and the area is beginning to become less peaceful and rural.This is of especial concern to the people who first moved here for peace and quiet!
One particular feature of local concern at the present time is a spate of burglaries which have been taking place in the area.A number of people have had property stolen and no one has been caught yet. it is widely believed, despite the lack of convictions, that it is the work of organised gangs from London.
